content:
I'm not sure I like the "drafts at top" yet; the drafts button is at the bottom, and the drafts I'm most likely to care about are the most recent ones.
I think the spacing is also not quite right (sorry for not getting to it earlier)

Would it make sense to pull this off for the release, and work out the details afterwards?
I don't think there's anything urgent for the release.
I like it much better, personally, though.
If it were up to me, I'd release the new stuff, since there aren't any real regressions and this UI has always been gross.
@Vaibhav One thing that I do notice with the new blue border is a tiny bit of whitespace just inside it.

@Vaibhav One thing that I do notice with the new blue border is a tiny bit of whitespace just inside it.

Yeah! That was intentional. It's not white spacing, it's the border around the draft box that I did not color intentionally. Reason being the conflict between the blue border and the draft box occurred due to the difference in color between the stream label and the blue color. Space between them cleaned things up a bit.
